thread.title: Nonprofit Hands Out Gifts And Free Breakfast To Families In Need In West Philadelphia On Christmas
thread.title_full: Nonprofit Hands Out Gifts And Free Breakfast To Families In Need In West Philadelphia On Christmas

author: CBS Philly
title: Nonprofit Hands Out Gifts And Free Breakfast To Families In Need In West Philadelphia On Christmas
text:
[Seasonal & Holidays](/pennsylvania/philadelphia/holidays)
Nonprofit Hands Out Gifts And Free Breakfast To Families In Need In West Philadelphia On Christmas
Besides the meal and gift-giving, Chosen 300 Ministries' Executive Director Brian Jenkins led a Christmas worship service.
December 26, 2024
Volunteers with [Chosen 300 Ministries](http://www.chosen300.org/) handed out 500 children's gifts and free breakfast to families in need in West Philadelphia on Christmas Day.
Find out what's happening in Philadelphiafor free with the latest updates from Patch.
Justice Taylor, 8, was one of the children who received free gifts and breakfast.
"Thank you for all for coming here and standing up and clap!" Taylor said.
Find out what's happening in Philadelphiafor free with the latest updates from Patch.
